subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Skier Tim Durtschi garnered attention for his exploits in ski resort terrain parks and jumps in the backcountry. But he has stepped away from manicured features to ski natural terrain.
snippet: Skier Tim Durtschi garnered attention for his exploits in ski resort terrain parks and jumps in the backcountry. But he has stepped away from manicured features to ski natural terrain.
